message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Alice, $180 is a bit too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my maximum budget is $120. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we meet at $160? It's a great compromise that I think you'll find reasonable.
Alice, $160 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $130.  If you're not able to come down to that price, I'll have to go with another offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about we meet at $145? It's a good compromise that I think is fair for both of us.
